items.title: Gamba Sonatas with Anne-Linde
items.description: Anne-Linde Visser and I will be playing two sonatas for viola da gamba and harpsichord - G major, BWV 1027 and G minor BWV 1029 at the Royal Academy of Music.
items.repertoire: JS Bach // Sonatas for viola da gamba and harpsichord

items.title: St Matthew Passion
items.description: Conducted by Trevor Pinnock, the historical performance department at Royal Academy of Music will present the St. Matthew Passion in Duke's Hall.

items.title: Augusta Read Thomas' Residency @ U Michigan
items.description: Jeff Siegfried & I performed CHANT at the UMMA (University of Michigan Museum of Art) at one of the concerts featuring Augusta Read Thomas' works.
items.repertoire: Augusta Read Thomas // Chant for Alto Saxophone and Piano

items.title: Bach in the Subways
items.description: As part of Bach's birthday celebration, cellist Dahae and I played at Beacon Hill Station!
items.repertoire: JS Bach // Partita No. 4 in D major, excerpts from various French suites, a gamba sonata or two

items.title: Groupmuse in Seattle
items.description: Joined by my friends Dahae Cheong & Judith Kim on cello and violin respectively, I played some awesome piano trios with Groupmuse while I was home in Seattle.
items.repertoire:
Antonin Dvorak // Dumky Trio
LV Beethoven // Trio in C minor, Op. 1 No. 3

items.title: NON:Op / Frontier Feminists
items.description: This was a NON:op event, "a celebration of the Frontier Feminists who trailblazed a path to the farthest reaches of America from the Alaskan wilderness to the isolated Black Hills to the desolate plains of Arkansas." Our audiences enjoyed performances while enjoying food by Easy Eats and brews from middle brow beer.
items.repertoire:
Judith Cloud // Flying Inside Your Own Body from Night Dreams
Barbara Harbach // Pioneer Women: From Skagway to White Mountain
Lori Laitman // Blue Iris

items.title: Bach and Beyond
items.description: The Elmhurst Symphony Musicians in Performance at Mayslake concluded its 2017-18 season with “Bach and Beyond”  at Mayslake Peabody Estate. I played harpsichord with soprano Josefien Stoppelenburg and cellist Jean Hatmaker.
items.repertoire:
GF Handel // La Lucrezia
WA Mozart // Alleluia
JS Bach // Ouverture from Partita No. 4 in D major
JS Bach // Aria from Phoebus Elit mit schneiden Pferden

items.title: Champaign-Urbana Symphony Orchestra
items.description: I performed a concerto as part of the "Music of Titans" concert. Conducted by Maestro Stephen Alltop.
items.repertoire: WA Mozart // Piano Concerto No. 14 in Eb
